DOC.brief_summary: Few previous study explore effect mind body approach health-related quality life ( HRQoL ) frail elderly . Cognition action inseparable whole functioning . A new intervention-based approach use familiarity base movement non-judgmental approach label `` cognition-action . '' The investigator aim explore effect two different mind-body exercise type ( HRQoL ) frail institutionalize elderly . The investigator ' main hypothesis adaptated physical activity frail institutionalize elderly improve HRQoL .
